title: New Guest: Jād Saxton!
content:
The JAFAX team is excited to announce Jād Saxton, known for her extensive voice talent work on many well-known series, such as "Fruits Basken", "My Hero Academia", and "Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid"! When not working behind the microphone, she uses her experience with other voice actors as an ADR at Funimation Studios.

To read more about her extensive roles and titles credited as ADR, browse here.
